articles.description: Follow BBC radio and text commentary updates from the Europa League as Aston Villa take on Fenerbahce and Celtic travel to Bologna in the early kick-offs.
articles.title: Europa League LIVE: Fenerbahce vs Aston Villa, Bologna vs Celtic, Braga vs Nottingham Forest & Rangers vs Ludogorets- score, radio commentary & text updates

articles.description: England change formats and opponents, yet still follow their dismal Ashes campaign with defeat by Sri Lanka in the first one-day international in Colombo.
articles.title: Sri Lanka vs England: Harry Brook's side lose first ODI in Colombo

articles.description: Manchester United say midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of this season.
articles.title: Casemiro: Man Utd's Brazil midfielder to leave club this summer

articles.description: Erling Haaland made a blistering start to the season but that prolific run of form has ground to a halt with only one goal in his past eight games.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Has Manchester City striker played too much football?

articles.description: When the Denver Broncos host the New England Patriots on Sunday in the AFC Championship game, it will be with a back-up quarterback who has not thrown an NFL pass for two seasons.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Jarrett Stidham's journey from back-up quarterback to brink of a Super Bowl

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on actor Eanna Hardwicke, who plays Roy Keane in the new film Saipan - and AI - with his predictions for this week's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v 'Roy Keane' - Saipan star Eanna Hardwicke - and AI

articles.description: Naomi Osaka apologises for "disrespecting" Sorana Cirstea after receiving a frosty handshake from the Romanian after their Australian Open second-round match.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Naomi Osaka and Sorana Cirstea have awkward handshake after Osaka's second-round win

articles.description: Noah Caluori believes he needs to make his England senior debut over the next six months to stay on track for his ambition to be one of the game's great wings.
articles.title: Noah Caluori aims for England debut inside six months

articles.description: Lock Thibaud Flament will miss France's Six Nations opener against Ireland next month because it clashes with his wife's fertility treatment.
articles.title: Six Nations: Thibaud Flament to miss France opener against Ireland

articles.description: As Cameron Norrie bids to beat Alexander Zverev for the first time in seven meetings, BBC Sport looks at what it is like to be on the wrong end of a head-to-head record.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Can Cameron Norrie end unwanted record against Alexander Zverev?
